name: Google Antigravity
description: AI-first integrated development environment launched alongside Gemini 3 Pro, designed as an agent-first IDE that enables developers to delegate complex coding tasks to autonomous AI agents.
community_quotes: Described as potentially 'the most significant development tool since Git'
Called a 'revolutionary AI-first IDE that's redefining how developers code'
Promises far fewer hallucinations than previous versions with improved Gemini 3 Pro reasoning capabilities

name: Google ADK Go
description: Google's Agent Development Kit extended to Go, bringing native agentic workflows to backend teams with open-source toolkit for building AI agents.
community_quotes: Bringing native agentic workflows to backend teams
Open-source toolkit for building AI agents
Supports local development to managed production deployment

name: CodeHinter
description: An intuitive debugging assistant that combines traditional debugging tools with LLM-based techniques for enhanced code analysis and error detection.
community_quotes: Combines traditional debugging tools with LLM-based techniques
Enhanced code analysis and error detection capabilities
